name: Project Orion (clee)
description:
Project Orion is a VR mech fighting game based on the popular Pacific Rim movies. In this demo players can see our hub area which is intended to ask as a mission deployment point, and one of our coastal levels. On the coast, players will be dropped into a basic mech and are able to control full range of motion through VR interface. 

Feature

  1. Dynamic hand track
  2. Elementary Systems
  3. Basic AI.
  4. Custom Models and Shaders

Future Plans

  1. Y-axis translation of mech to respond to player actions based on headset data.
  2. AI overhauls
  3. Event systems / Tasking for objective based missions

Currently this game is only supported on Oculus Rift.
